## AbstractConnector.findSegmentForPoint() method

Function: findSegmentForPoint Returns the segment that is closest to the given \[x,y\], null if nothing found. This function returns a JS object with:

d - distance from segment l - proportional location in segment x - x point on the segment y - y point on the segment s - the segment itself.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findSegmentForPoint(x: number, y: number): SegmentForPoint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number |  |
|  y | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

SegmentForPoint
